mapper.select: select providers_id as providersId, provider_name as providerName, profile as profile, phone_no as phoneNo, address as address, logo as logo, type as type, head as head, city as city from tbl_providers_info where sts=0 and type in (#{type}) order by order_no LIMIT #{startRow}, #{pageSize}

select providers_id as providersId, provider_name as providerName, profile as profile, phone_no as phoneNo, address as address, logo as address, head as head, city as city from tbl_providers_info where sts=0 and providers_id =#{providersId}
select count(*) from tbl_providers_info where sts=0
